sentences.sentence: What amazed him even more than her appearance was her poise.
sentences.translation: 比她的长相更让他惊讶的是她的沉着镇定。

sentences.sentence: To be a successful fashion model, a guy needs to be more than just a looker. He has to have confidence, poise and a sense of style.
sentences.translation: 要成为一个成功的时装模特，一个人不仅要长相出众。他还必需要自信、优雅并有时尚感。

sentences.sentence: A Pickpocket Needs Poise, Patience And panache.
sentences.translation: 扒窃是一门需要沉着、耐心与范儿的艺术。
